channel.title: MacVim on Dave Hudson
channel.description: Recent content in MacVim on Dave Hudson

item.title: Episode IV: A new blog (or rebooting it anyway)
item.description: A number of times in the past I’ve found myself wanting to blog about some of the things I’ve been reading about, thinking about, or working on. Somehow, though, I’ve never managed to make this stick. Back in 2014/2015 I did manage to get into quite a good habit of blogging about Bitcoin mining but then I ended up busy and the blogging fell aside. I’d also falled out of love with Joomla as a blogging platform.
